Camera permission is needed to run this application Please install ARCore Please update ARCore Please update this app This device does not support AR Failed to create AR session NASA Earth images are used (https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/) Distributed under Attribution 4.0 International license (CC BY 4.0) NASA Earth images from public domain are used https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/images/73580 https://visibleearth.nasa.gov/images/73934
